version 1.0 2018-07-17

Scripts using Python

```
>>> int('39A7F8',16)
3778552
>>> bin(int('39A7F8',16))
'0b1110011010011111111000'
>>> int('1100100101111011',2)
51579
>>> hex(int('1100100101111011',2))
'0xc97b'
>>> bin(int('D5E4C',16))
'0b11010101111001001100'
>>> hex(int('1001101110011110110101',2))
'0x26e7b5'
```
